scripts.install-all: npm i && cd client && npm i --f
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -p [{name}-{time}] -c cyan,green -n server,client "nodemon development" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start:stage: concurrently "npm start staging" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm start production" "cd client && npm run dev"
